metadata.title: CVE-2020-0182 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In exif_entry_get_value of exif-entry.c, there is a possible out of boundsread due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local informationdisclosure with no additional execution privileges needed. User interactionis not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10AndroidID: A-147140917

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-0182` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-6ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libexif package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-6ubuntu0.3').
